SELECT uuid AS uuid_key, name AS title, description, CASE WHEN language IS NULL THEN 'en' ELSE language END AS language, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(email))<5 THEN NULL ELSE email END AS email, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(phone))<5 THEN NULL ELSE phone END AS phone, homepage, logoURL AS logo_url, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(address))<1 THEN NULL ELSE address END AS address, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(city))<1 THEN NULL ELSE city END AS city, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(iso_country_code))<2 THEN NULL ELSE iso_country_code END AS country, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(zip))<1 THEN NULL ELSE zip END AS postal_code, created, modified, deleted FROM agent WHERE type = 14080 OR uuid = '7ddf754f-d193-4cc9-b351-99906754a03b'
INSERT INTO network(key,title,description,language,email,phone,homepage,logo_url,address,city,country,postal_code, created,modified,deleted,created_by,modified_by) VALUES(?uuid_key::uuid,?title,?description,?language,?email,?phone,?homepage,?logo_url,?address,?city,?country,?postal_code, ?created,?modified,?deleted,?{"ADMIN"}, ?{"ADMIN"});
